answers.answer: What type of advice about it do you need? :)
Just eat right, stay active, abd be happy that you're having a baby you can lose weight after :)
I agree with @Layapooh18 :) Thats what i do i'm plus size. I always drink water i stay away from sodas and candy. But if your craving it just a little wont hurt:)

So many people say a bonus of being pregnant is that you can eat whatever you want - so not true. I made that mistake and because i was already overweight it put extra strain on my body. Eat extra healthy if you can and try to eat a balanced diet. When you're already overweight you don't need to put on much weight for baby.

Eat right, stay active and rock those maternity pants early. I slipped right into those bad boys at ten weeks and it was over. They are comfy, cute and made for a big belly! Loving every second of that. Water is your best friend and don't let anyone get you down about anything. Especially be good about the eating right because we are at a higher risk for early diagnosis of gestational diabetes and that is no fun.

question: Any ladies out there have any advice for being plus sized and pregnant?  I'm not finding much help from anything else on the Internet.
title: Plus sized and pregnant
